title: In Order to Enter the Air Force, I Announced the Pulse Detonation Engine - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Determined Protagonist   Fast Learner   Firearms   Genius Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Multiple Identities   Nationalism   Pilots   Special Abilities
author: 南城保障
description:
An email of the research and development for the third-generation aero-engine project appeared in the mailbox of the flight academy. Everyone who checked the email was dumbfounded.

“The great god who developed the third-generation aero-engine by himself is an ordinary undergraduate? Am I crazy or is this a lie?”

The person who checked the email felt incredulous, but out of responsibility, he still reported the email. It didn’t take long for an internal message from the Aero Engine Research Institute to spread:

“Under the leadership of a chief engineer that is less than twenty years old, the third-generation aero-engine was successfully created.”

In less than a year, the fifth-generation fighter jet was successfully developed and became the most advanced fighter in the world.

For a while, everyone was shocked.>
